name: Curiyo Links
author: Curiyo

sections.description: Curiyo gives users a dynamic and comprehensive dive into any topic in your story, connecting your content to reference data, emerging insights and captivating social media. It resolves the urge to click out and search for more information. Instead, Curiyo delivers timely and contextually relevant content to the point of need, instantly and on demand. Users get all of what they want without ever leaving your page.
sections.installation:
Via admin:

  1. Go to Plugins -> Add New
  2. Search for Curiyo Links
  3. Install the plugin called “Curiyo Links” and activate it

Via upload:

  1. Download the plugin .zip file
  2. Log in to yourdomain.com/wp-admin
  3. Click Plugins -> Add New -> Upload
  4. Click on the Curiyo link in the sidebar of the Admin panel, and click Update.
sections.changelog:
1.3.1

  • Fixed version number

1.3

  • Simplified interface.
  • Add ability to set link color.
  • Add ability to set maximum number of links per page.

1.2

  • Calls the “Cards” version of Curiyo.

1.1

  • Works with 3.8
  • Don’t add javascript for users on mobile devices
  • Improved formatting of results page

1.0.1

  • Fix conflict with Relevanssi
  • Display by tag, then category, then search
  • Changed Submit Button to say “Update” instead of “Save Changes”
